segments.text: You should have been at home and enjoyed a big meal .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . I should have gone to buy the ticket in advance . But now ...
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: But now you can stay with friends and enjoy a holiday too .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Right . Let's go and find some fun .
segments.speaker: S2
